title: Blanc Noir
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Blanc Noir par Lbenj
16 f 1 wellat blan noir 
Li chat f 3emri ghan3icho pourboire 
Kteb Lah w tefre9na dak nhar, m3ak 3echt ch7al men victoire 
Jme3na l7ob w fer9atna l a9dar 
Zakaria li f seghro kan khayf 
Kent jaban w kansret lbayd 
9rit chta w kent kankhdem sayf 
F moraha9ti wellit sat khayb 
Normal, ra mimti li kant 3ndi daha Rebbi 
Chwitini a mmi 
3reft bzaf wrak w makanoch b7alk 
Kona kbar w f l'age b3alk 
7sebt l3a9a kadir bonheur
Jme3t sak w matbeddelch l'couleurs 
Ba9a blanc noir, ba9a blan noir, ba9a blanc noir 

Tana 7egrouni, melli kont niya w ba9i fragile 
W daba lamouni, melli dert lkhayba nsaw l'passé 
Ch7al men menottes w ch7al men ma7dar 
La dert l'buzz kanstahel ma kter 
Kant fa9ir w kanmout b char
Lhamdollah daba zyan lmandar 

Blanc Noir 
Ana 7yati Blanc Noir 
Machi normal 
Ana 7yati Blanc Noir 
Machi normal 
Ana machi normal,Blanc Noir 
Wora lbuzz khoya tbadl kolchi 
1000 saheb o ta had ma vrai 
Chkon bgha ydir ljahannam ymchi 
CTRL A w cliquer entré wasst slati 
Ki borch jldi mli kantfkr chno 

Kent kandir 3afak a rabii sam7ni 

Rivo rivo rivo doubi 
3amayn dazzt valé valé 
Ghar9 f dnoub 
Tay7t drassii b7al lbooling 
Kent batal wast alaaf kolhom r3awin ki bano mrjlin 
Machina ghaltiin 
Bdit saf7a jdida 
[?] mssawsso 
Nefssi dimaa f smaa 
Tba3siis o manksab 7ta calsson 
Rankawen rassi manbi3ch ro7ii 
Kima daro bzaf ki mana o (lalala) 
Ch7al ghrara had dnya
Blanc Noir 
Ana 7yati Blanc Noir 

Machi normal 
Ana 7yati Blanc Noir 
Machi normal 
Ana machi normal,Blanc Noir
